resources.string: Are you sure you want to clear all cache data?
Check and update to latest version
View app information, version and copyright
Will apply to all currently playing sounds
This will clear all cache data of the app, including images, videos, temporary files, etc.

XMSLEEP is a professional white noise and natural sound playback app dedicated to providing you with high-quality audio experiences. The app includes a variety of carefully selected natural sounds, including rain, thunder, campfire, bird chirping, and more, to help you relax, improve focus, and enhance sleep quality.\n\nBuilt with Material Design 3 guidelines, the app features a clean and beautiful interface with smooth and intuitive operations. It supports multiple languages, customizable themes, independent volume control, quick play, favorites, and many other features to provide you with a personalized sound experience.

• Click sound cards to start playback, click again to stop
• Click volume icon to adjust volume for each sound individually
• Click title to set quick play or favorite sounds
• Click pushpin icon to batch select sounds and add to quick play
• Use countdown feature to set auto-stop playback time
• In settings, you can adjust theme, hide animations, switch layouts, etc.

• Built-in sounds: No internet required, can be played directly
• Online sounds: First use requires download, can be played offline after download
• Quick Play: Maximum 3 sounds can be added, supports mixing local and online sounds
• Favorite feature: Add favorite sounds to favorites list for quick access
• Volume adjustment: Each sound can be adjusted independently, supports 0-100% precise control
• Countdown feature: Set playback duration, automatically stops all sounds when time is up

All audio content provided by this app comes from publicly available audio resource libraries, including but not limited to:

• Built-in sounds: The built-in sound files come from open-source audio resource libraries, carefully selected and optimized to ensure clear sound quality suitable for long-term playback.

• Online sounds: The sound resources loaded via the network come from the moodist project (https://github.com/remvze/moodist), an open-source ambient sounds project. All resources comply with the MIT open-source license.

• Copyright Notice: This app only provides audio playback functionality and does not own the copyright of any audio content. All audio content is for personal learning and entertainment purposes only. Please do not use for commercial purposes. If you find any audio content that infringes your copyright, please contact us and we will handle it promptly.

© 2025 XMSLEEP. All rights reserved.

The audio content provided by this app is for personal learning and entertainment purposes only.
Please respect the copyright of related audio resources and do not use them for commercial purposes.
Hide WebP animation in sound cards
Built-in sounds can be played offline
Maximum 3 can be selected to quick play
Maximum 3 sounds can be added to quick play
Please play a sound before setting countdown
Online sounds will be displayed here
Use wallpaper color as theme color
Use pure black background in dark mode
Please download the audio first before adding to Quick Play
Favorite sounds will be displayed here

This app highly values your privacy protection.

• Data Collection: This app does not collect any personally identifiable information. The app only collects anonymous usage statistics (such as launch count, usage duration, etc.) to improve the app experience.

• Data Usage: Statistical data is only used for app feature optimization and will not be used for any commercial purposes or shared with third parties.

• Permissions: This app only requests necessary audio playback permissions and will not access your contacts, location, or other sensitive information.

• Data Security: We adopt industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including data encryption and access control.

If you have any questions, please contact us through the in-app contact method.
